name: Dice Out
description:
Submission for GMTK Jam 2022: Roll of the Dice.

You play as a dice that got stuck in Gnargle’s bowel. Feeling sympathetic, you decided to help Gnargle with their problem and get dice out. In order to do that, you have to finish nine simple puzzles that involve dice rotation.

Controls: WASD or cursor keys. R to restart level. Enter to continue, Esc to cancel
